name: Leofric Construction Ltd
tag_list: builders, roofing, loft-conversions, coventry, rugby, solihull
overview: Leofric Construction Ltd. is operating for the last 45 years with wide experience in all types of roofing and attic extensions. Our expertise team helps you in transforming dusty, unused areas into light, airy living spaces and increasing the value of your home. We are the longest established loft conversions & roofing company in the Warwickshire area. We are committed to deliver only quality work with customer oriented services. Our prices are very competitive and our wide range of services includes designing & constructing totally new roofing structures and thorough roof repairs.
